text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text:
These days peeps post 
pictures of the food and sweets on 
the Internet for everyone to see, right?

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text:
If that's the case, big sis knows the 
trendiest Equinstable foods～…!

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text:
Their names are… nata de coco and
tiramisu! They're absolutely fab with
Italian food☆

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text:
They'll bring you tons of, what were 
they, "Me Gustas" for sure!
